description: Implement core countdown timer with configurable duration, terminal display, and audible bell on completion.
done_criteria: Timer counts down from N seconds, displays remaining time, and rings bell when done.

description: Persist timer state to disk so it survives terminal closure. Include error handling, concurrency detection, and define the state file format.
done_criteria: Timer state is saved/restored across terminal sessions. Concurrent access is detected and handled.

description: Add short and long break sessions with visual distinction from work sessions.
done_criteria: Break timer runs with different display style. Short (5min) and long (15min) breaks supported.

description: Track position within a 4-pomodoro cycle. Determine when long break is due.
done_criteria: System tracks which pomodoro in the cycle (1-4) and triggers long break after 4th.

description: Handle interrupted work sessions: allow resume or void.
done_criteria: User can resume an interrupted work session or void it. Voided sessions are not counted.

description: Read-only status command showing current timer state, cycle position, and session history.
done_criteria: gotg status shows current state without modifying anything.

description: Append-only session history log in Unix-parseable format.
done_criteria: Completed sessions are logged to a history file. File is parseable with standard Unix tools.
